attributes.action: Listen to the people, and abandon plans for the privatisation of the Royal Mail.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In every poll conducted with regard to government plans to privatise Royal Mail, the vast majority of the public has expressed a wish that these plans are binned forthwith.
Please, for once, don't ignore the democratic will of the people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
